alert.note: Alert for Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 30 at 11:54AM EDT until August 31 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Big Bend Florida, including the following counties, Madison and Taylor. * WHEN...Until 200 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. River or stream flows are elevated. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1151 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicated between 4 and 9 inches of rain had fallen this morning. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Madison, Perry, Greenville, Moseley Hall, Shady Grove, Ebb, Sirmans, Hopewell, Lake Bird, Boyd, Iddo, Secotan, Eridu, Hamburg, Cherry Lake, Hanson, Perry-Foley Airport, Hampton Springs and Pinetta. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
